levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, and immediately summons Heart Candles tied to up to <@ba.vup>3</> ground enemies within range with the highest HP; attacks against the Heart Candles deal at least <@ba.vup>35%</> ATK as damage to them; Heart Candles inherit <@ba.vdown>{attack@max_hp_scale:0%}</> of the corresponding enemy's current HP, and when attacked, that enemy will lose the same amount of HP as the Heart Candle
<@ba.rem>Heart Candles are only affected by Entelechia's attacks</>

<@ba.rem>Heart Candles are only affected by Entelechia's attacks</>
